title: Penguin Weight Prediction
text:
In this notebook, we’ll build a simple linear regression model to predict penguin weight based on bill length using the Palmer Penguins dataset.
#| echo: true #| warning: false #| message: false
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
